short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mini book to get mysteries of the Holy Rosary

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a mini book to get prayers and mysteries of the Holy Rosary. As a Catholic, when praying the holy rosary, one can often forget the prayers and mysteries or the particular mystery to pray on the said day. This extension simply provides a basic interface listing the rosary prayers, mystery titles and the days they are to be prayed.
